item.title: [317] animation problem [317]
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

it requires some sort of process to do this… not going to write it all out though for you.

you need to create a timer for the firemaking, then under the animation you set timer = 10, then the process will reduce the timer each game tick until the timer = 0, then you need to create a method for when the timer = 0 to create the ground object and such…

or u can just rip someone elses work, google.com

Read full topic

item.title: [317] animation problem [317]

item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

well you can do this
add this in client.java

	public boolean startedanimation = false;

when you did that.
use this

} else if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1511)) {
                        startAnimation(733);
startedanimation = true;
                                if (playerLevel[11] >= 0 && startedanimation == true) {
                                        deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
                                         makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10);
                                        addSkillXP(180, 11);
sM("You attempt to light the logs.");
sM("The fire catches and the logs begin to burn.");
fmwalkto(0, -1);
resetWC();

item.title: [317] animation problem [317]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Source: Delta

I use this code for firemaking under case 53:

} else if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1511)) { startAnimation(733); if (playerLevel[11] >= 0) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(180, 11); sM("You attempt to light the logs."); sM("The fire catches and the logs begin to burn."); fmwalkto(0, -1); resetWC();

The Problem is I dont know how to do the animation first before lighting the logs because this code is doing the animation after the logs are lit.

Please help

Thanks

Read full topic
